data.title: Coach Holidays in the UK and Europe
data.meta_description: With 1000s of great-value holidays to choose from, discover the very best of the UK and Europe – from start to finish, we take care of everything.

Destination

Please select a Destination - These Destinations have been updated to show / not show based on your search criteria

Travelling by coach is the most relaxing way to begin your holiday as we take care of everything. You don't have to worry about road maps or planning, just sit back, unwind, and enjoy the journey with Shearings.

Travel in complete comfort with our fantastic coach fleet.

The perfect place to relax, enjoy reclining seats, arm and footrests, and air conditioning on our fantastic coaches to make your journey as comfortable as possible. Watch the world go by as you drive through beautiful scenery, or socialise with like-minded travellers, share stories, and maybe even make friends for life.
